1153500.name: Visual Novel Maker - Silent Horror Music
1153500.description:
Haunting, unsettling, this new pack from Bitter Sweet Entertainment will make your darkest nightmares and game scenes come true! Featuring classic sinister piano-based dramatic songs, lamenting orchestral pieces, to outright spooky and demented soundscapes and tortured ambience, more than enough to bring out the full range of fear in your darkest game scenes with this twisted new pack!

FEATURES:

* 17 BGM, 9 BGS and 17 ME for royalty-free use
* m4a / ogg formats included
* Music for Visual Novel Games, horror games, halloween games, spooky dungeon mapping and more!
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!
